item.title: Create a Brent Resource Package
item.description: Introduction and Structure A Brent resource package is a zip file conforming to a specific layout. For example, if the resource uses the Openstack driver and Ansible driver, the resource package directory will be as follows: Definitions/ lm/ resource.yaml # mandatory Lifecycle/ ansible/ config/ host_vars/ myhost.yaml inventory scripts/ Install.yaml Start.yaml openstack/ heat.yaml The Definitions directory contains the LM descriptor file. The Lifecycle directory should be populated with scripts and templates required by the chosen driver(s).
